modName: The One Ring a LOTR mod
summary: Adds The One Ring from the LOTR universe, with ALL the effects.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[b][heading][color=orange]The One Ring[/color][/heading][/b]


[b][color=orange]Description[/color][/b]

The One Ring was forged by the Dark Lord Sauron during the Second Age in order to gain dominion over the free peoples of Middle-earth.
A person wearing the Ring would enter a shadowy world revealing the physical world from a different aspect from which physical objects were harder to see.
Normally the One Ring appeared perfectly plain and featureless, but when heated its inscription appeared in fiery letters.

[color=orange][i]"One ring to rule them all, one ring to find them,
One ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them."[/i][/color]


[b][color=orange]What does it do?[/color][/b]

When you wear the One Ring :

- You will be [b]invisible[/b]
- You will [b]see the physical world distorted[/b]
- You will [b]hear the calls of Sauron[/b]
- You will [b]lose [color=red]Health[/color] [color=green]Stamina[/color] and [color=blue]Magicka[/color] over time[/b]
- You will have [b]+500% Sneak[/b]

[b]OPTIONNAL MESH MADE BY [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2345988/?]MadNuttah[/url]:[/b]

[img=center]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/35920-1-1368470078.png[/img]


[b][color=orange]Location[/color][/b]

The One Ring is located on a desk, at [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:High_Hrothgar]High Hrothgar[/url].
Enter High Hrothgar and go far left.

[img=center]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/35920-1-1368278257.jpg[/img]

[img=center]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/35920-1-1368278444.jpg[/img]

You can always obtain the ring by adding it to your inventory with the console.

help one*ring -> Note the ID
player.additem 'ID' 1

[b]Known bug : If you don't have SKSE, you'll have the vanilla-invisibility-eyes-bug
To fix it, just install [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url][/b].


[b][color=orange]Things to know[/color][/b]

[b]The meshes are from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2915/?]Rings Of Tamriel Modders Resource[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2345988/?]MadNuttah[/url].

The Eyes bug was solved with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23916/?]Invisibility Glitch - Eyes Fix[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1892262/?]KingsGambit[/url].

All the screenshots were done with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828//?]Unbleak ENB 05 Performance[/url].

A special thank to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2345988/?]MadNuttah[/url] who helped me to fix some bugs and who created the amazing new Mesh and Textures :)


Copyright 2016 514Y32 It is stricly forbidden to upload this content on Steam.
[/b][/center]
author: 514Y32
